text: I was looking into this recently, and it doesn't look like custom modules is something we have an API for currently

The 'templates' and 'layouts' language here is admittedly a bit confusing. A 'layout' is the traditional drag-and-drop style templates. Pulling these will give you the pre-rendered structure of a page created in-app. Coded files are not accessible from the Layouts API.

A 'template' is the actual html template used to render a webpage. Pulling these gives you the HTML and related metadata used to render a page. Coded files are included in the Templates API, and you can programmatically create templates here too.
Hello. What's the best way to connect HubSpot with Data Studio? I was thinking of using the Stitch connector. Any recommendations?
